original_text: A widow, or a divorced woman, or a woman who has been defiled, or a prostitute, these he shall not marry. But he shall take as his wife a virgin of his own people,
korean_text: 과부나 이혼 당한 여자나 창녀 짓을 하는 더러운 여인을 취하지 말고 자기 백성 중에서 처녀를 취하여 아내를 삼아

sentences.original_text: or a woman who has been defiled

sentences.korean_translation: 이런 여자는 아내로 삼지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: But he shall take as his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 자기 아내로 삼을 것인데

sentences.original_text: a virgin of his own people
